user_text: I think the main driver for my motivation at work is the pursiuit of skill acquisition, but yesterday I also realzied that a big think that I like is just the adrenaline and the fulfillment that comes from using your mind capacity to the fullest potential. I was in a fast meeting where I had to persuade my coworker of some ideas that I had for the sales team and that adrenaline from the fast debate just made me feel alive, this is what I want in my everyday work life. Deep thinking and working towards excellence

A livello fisico, il mio sonno è ok, sto dormendo abbastanza, forse anche troppo (segnale che di solito comporta un problema conoscnedomi), e soprattutto sto ricercando degli stimoli prima di andare a dormire per coprire la mente, interessante. Questo è gia un qualcosa.
